execution_plan.description: Get active products from the store_main database and normalize columns (mark source, id as text, name, active boolean).
execution_plan.query: SELECT 'store_main' AS source_database, id::text AS id_or_code, name, is_active AS active FROM products WHERE is_active = true;

execution_plan.description: Get active items from the store_alt database and normalize columns (mark source, id/code as text, name, active boolean).
execution_plan.query: SELECT 'store_alt' AS source_database, code::text AS id_or_code, title AS name, (active = 'Y') AS active FROM items WHERE active = 'Y';
